lines.text: Drum and colours. Enter MALCOLM, SIWARD, MACDUFF, and their Army, with boughs

lines.speaker: malcolm
lines.text: Now near enough: your leafy screens throw down. And show like those you are. You, worthy uncle, Shall, with my cousin, your right-noble son, Lead our first battle: worthy Macduff and we Shall take upon 's what else remains to do, According to our order.

lines.speaker: siward
lines.text: Fare you well. Do we but find the tyrant's power to-night, Let us be beaten, if we cannot fight.

lines.speaker: macduff
lines.text: Make all our trumpets speak; give them all breath, Those clamorous harbingers of blood and death.
